R.I. woman claims $336.4m Powerball

R.I. woman takes $336.4m Powerball jackpot

Louise White only bought the winning Powerball ticket -- the largest ever in R.I. lottery history -- when a family member wanted some rainbow sherbet. (Globe, 12:52 p.m.)

Report: Pittsfield radio station drops Limbaugh's syndicated talk show

CNN reports WBEC 1420 AM dropped Limbaugh's program following recent derogatory comments about a Georgetown law student. (Globe, 12:21 p.m.)

Five 'Anonymous' hackers busted
after one becomes an FBI informant

Five people were charged, and a sixth, who became an FBI informant, pleaded guilty in the first significant prosecution of major Internet hackers. (AP, 1:30 p.m.)
